alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 23 at 3:56PM AKDT until July 24 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR THE COPPER RIVER BASIN FROM GLENNALLEN NORTH... * Timing...Monday afternoon through evening. * Location...From Glennallen northward in the Copper River Basin. This includes the area north of the Glenn Highway in the western part of the Basin. * Lightning Activity Level...4. * Winds...Northwest 5 to 10 mph. * Relative Humidity...38 to 45 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 70s to lower 80s. * Impacts...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
